altTitles.ja: 世話やきキツネの仙狐さん

description.en:
Like many hardworking members of the workforce, Kuroto Nakano is perpetually stressed out by his job. Still, since he lives alone, he must carry on to sustain himself. Little do humans like Kuroto know, this stress takes the form of darkness residing within a person's body and will bring one's life to ruin.  
Fox deities can see this darkness and have the duty to save people before it is too late. To help rid Kuroto of his stress, Senko-san, an eight hundred-year-old foxgirl, volunteers to take care of him, and will do everything she can to ease the tension in his weary soul.

---

**Notes:**
- Despite initial serialization ending by November 2022, Comic Newtype announced on 9 February 2023 that the series would later resume publication.
description.ru: В повседневную жизнь Накано, работающего на «чёрную компанию», внезапно вторглась кицунэ Сэнко-сан (молодая жена 800 лет от роду). Будь то готовка, уборка или «особая забота» (чем бы это ни было), она исцелит его истощение своей нежной «заботой».
description.es-la: La vida cotidiana de Nanako, un hombre asalariado que trabaja en una compañía que lo explota, es repentinamente invadido por la Kitsune, Senko-san (800 años de edad- esposa joven). Ya sea cocina, limpieza o un servicio especial... Ella curará su agotamiento con su tierno cuidado.

altTitles.ja: 複雑な姉弟の４コマ

altTitles.en: A Complicated Older Sister and Younger Brother 4-Koma
The Person I Met In-Game Was Actually My Big Sister

description.en:
"Big Sis!?"
"Kouta!?"


The two of them were enjoying an in-game romance (without knowing each other's identities). Upon seeing each other's faces at their long-awaited offline meetup... they were both shocked to see that their partner was in fact their own sibling!?

These are complicated feelings for sure... and rather hard to accept!

(Source: Kadokawa)

---

Additional Links

* [Kadokawa](https://store.kadokawa.co.jp/shop/g/g322302001578/) (Publisher)
* [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/20068503/vol_no/001)
description.ja:
「姉ちゃん!?」
「康太!?」

＊

ゲーム内で恋愛を楽しんでいたふたり。
待ちに待ったオフ会で顔を合わせたら……相手はまさかの姉弟で!?
複雑なこの感情……なかなか飲み込むのは難しい！

ＳＮＳで話題のカオス展開ラブコメが、 描き下ろしを加えて待望の書籍化!!

altTitles.ja: 救世主(メシア) ~人類を救いし者~

description.en: The story of Jesus Christ told through Manga.

altTitles.ja: 淫獄団地

description.en:
This apartment complex has a problem with perverted women!

Yoshida is a tiny, frail highschool graduate who became an unwilling manager of an apartment complex when his father, the former manager, injured himself. Unbeknownst to him, this apartment complex houses quite a few women with very... unusual sexual preferences. This becomes a problem when a mysterious entity begins giving "Libido Cloth" to these women - skimpy outfits that give them superpowers and cause them to go on lewd rampages! Will Yoshida be able to stop them?

altTitles.ja: 遊☆戯☆王OCGストーリーズ

description.en: In the distant past, the prosperous nation of Karma waged war against the nation of Spectra, resulting in the creation of an AI that wiped out all humans. Centuries later, Raye, the last surviving human, lives amongst an android society on the outskirts of Karma. On the night of her 13th birthday, her peaceful life is upended when Spectra attacks, destroying her home and forcing her friends to the front lines. Desperate to save everything she loves, Raye calls upon humanity's last bastion: "Sky Striker", the Karma-developed secret technology made to turn humans into the ultimate living weapons.… Unexpected, right? In this newest adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh, the focus of the plot is not on the card game, but instead the many storylines featured in the cards. The first arc surrounds the Sky Striker series, with more to come in the future.
description.pt-br:
No passado distante, a próspera nação de Kama travou uma guerra contra a nação de Spectra, resultando na criação de uma IA que eliminou todos os humanos. Séculos depois, Raye, a última humana sobrevivente, vive entre uma sociedade de andróides nos arredores de Kama. Na noite de seu aniversário de 13 anos, sua vida pacífica é interrompida quando Spectra ataca, destruindo sua casa e forçando seus amigos a irem para a linha de frente. Desesperada para salvar tudo o que ama, Raye invoca o último bastião da humanidade: "Força Celeste", a tecnologia secreta desenvolvida por Kama feita para transformar humanos em armas vivas definitivas.

... Inesperado, certo? Nesta mais nova adaptação de Yu-Gi-Oh, o foco do enredo não está no jogo de cartas, mas sim nas muitas histórias apresentadas nas cartas. O primeiro arco envolve a série Força Celeste, com mais por vir no futuro.

description.en:
Short manga posted by Holiday Yasumi on Twitter. 

The chapter numbers aren't important as most of the comics are unrelated to the rest, though some feature recurring characters.

Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

altTitles.ja: ストランド

description.en: Four high school classmates, not exactly close friends, share moments that are both fun and irreplaceable, yet tinged with a quiet heartache they don’t even realize. 'It feels like time has stopped.' Youth is both vibrant and muted. These are the daily lives of high schoolers—and the strange twists in between. A story that explores the meaning of a small act of courage in an unconventional coming-of-age drama (Anti-Electric Parade) begins!

altTitles.ja: 王様ランキング

description.en:
The web manga centers around Bojji, a deaf, powerless prince who cannot even wield a children's sword. As the firstborn son, he strives hard and dreams of becoming the world's greatest king. However, people mutter about him behind his back as "a good-for-nothing prince" and "no way he can be king."  
  
Bojji is able to make his first ever friend, "Kage" — a literal shadow on the ground who somehow understands Bojji well. The story follows Bojji's coming-of-age as he meets various people in his life, starting with his fateful encounter with Kage.
description.es:
Bojji es un príncipe sordomudo que vive en un mundo fantástico repleto de criaturas mágicas. Pese a no destacar en nada, y siendo incapaz ni siquiera de empuñar una espadita de niño, sueña con algún día convertirse en el rey más grande del mundo.

La gente lo considera un completo inútil y sin ningún talento para ser rey. Aunque la situación cambia cuando conoce a Kage, una sombra (literalmente) que es uno de los pocos supervivientes de un clan de asesinos y que intenta robarle las pocas pertenencias que Bojji llevaba encima.

De alguna manera, Kage logra comprender al príncipe y se convierte en su primer amigo verdadero, dando así inicio a la aventura que Bojji tanto anhela. Mientras tanto, en la oscuridad, un poder amenaza con devastar al reino.
description.ru: Боддзи удаётся найти своего первого в жизни друга, «Кагэ» — буквально тень на земле, которая каким-то образом хорошо понимает Боддзи. История рассказывает о взрослении Боддзи, о том, как он встречает разных людей в своей жизни, начиная с судьбоносной встречи с Кагэ.
description.vi:
"Bảng xếp hạng Quốc vương" xoay quanh Bojji, một hoàng tử điếc, vô năng, và thậm chí không thể cầm nổi thanh kiếm của một đứa con nít. Là con cả, cậu luôn cố gắng hết mình để tiến tới ước mơ trở thành vị vua vĩ đại nhất thế giới. Thế nhưng, luôn có những kẻ buông lời xì xào bàn tán sau lưng Bojji, bảo cậu là "một thằng hoàng tử bất tài", và "không đời nào có thể trở thành vua được". 

Bojji đã có người bạn đầu tiên của mình, "Kage", một bóng đen trên mặt đất, bằng cách nào đó lại có thể hiểu rõ về cậu. Đây là câu chuyện kể về sự trưởng thành của Bojji khi cậu gặp được những người khác nhau trong cuộc đời mình, bắt đầu từ lần gặp gỡ định mệnh của cậu với Kage.
description.pt-br:
O mangá da web comic gira em torno de Bojji, um príncipe surdo e impotente que não consegue nem empunhar uma espada infantil. Como filho primogênito, ele se esforça muito e sonha em se tornar o maior rei do mundo. No entanto, as pessoas murmuram sobre ele pelas costas como 'um príncipe inútil' e 'de jeito nenhum ele pode ser rei'.

Bojji é capaz de fazer seu primeiro amigo, 'Kage' - literalmente um ser vivo que é uma sombra no chão que de alguma forma entende Bojji bem. A história segue o amadurecimento de Bojji enquanto ele conhece várias pessoas em sua vida, começando com seu fatídico encontro com Kage.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 12, Cap 155. ]

description.en:
S Tier Hunter Sa Hyun--a member of HN, one of the world's top guilds--came to see Jeong Yi-Seon.

"I came to scout you, Mr. Jeong."
"Like hell you are, if you're approaching me like that."
"I don't think you know what exactly 'hell' is, but......"

Sa-hyun let out a laugh, looking just as if he were in a painting.

"Let's make a contract, shall we?"
"I'm not interested in any 'contract,' so please stop following me. You're getting..."
"I'll take care of them for you."
"What?"

Still full of laughter, he stared right at him. He was definitely smiling, but his icy eyes still sent a shiver down Yi-Seon's spine. Sa Hyun approached the stiff Yi-seon, one step at a time. Leaning down, he whispered. Whispered in a kind, friendly voice.

"Those corpses that haunt you... I'll take care of them."
description.ko:
세상에 '던전'이 나타나기 시작한 뒤로, 이능력을 사용하는 '각성자' 또한 나타났다.

무너진 도시를 재건하는 힘을 가진 복구사 정이선.
유일한 S급 복구사로 사람들의 관심과 사랑을 한몸에 받던 그는 돌연히 자취를 감춘다.

과거를 숨기고 잠적해 버린 그의 앞에 어느 날 S급 헌터 사현이 찾아와 거래를 제안하는데…

"계약해 보죠, 우리."
"그딴 거 관심 없으니까, 제발 그만 따라다녀. 이제…!"

정이선은 수상한 제의를 거절하려 하지만─

"당신이 데리고 있는 시체들, 내가 죽여 줄게요."

절망 끝에 서 있던 정이선에게 주어진 유일한 선택지는 사현과의 '계약'뿐인데….

altTitles.ja: よわよわ先生

description.en: It's the start of a new school year. The new homeroom teacher for Abikura-kun, a second-year high school boy, is Hiyori Hiwamura, who is known as a "Scary Teacher", rumored to curse you if she gets offended! One day after school, Abikura-kun witnessed the other side of "YowaYowa-sensei"... and he is shocked by the gap between reputation and reality! The opening of a romantic comedy that will stir up your protective instincts!!
description.ja: 新学期。2年生に進級した男子高校生・阿比倉くん達のクラス担任になったのは、機嫌を損ねれば呪われると噂の通称『こわこわ先生』こと、鶸村ひより先生だった！ そんな、『こわこわ先生』の裏の一面を、ある日の放課後、目撃してしまった阿比倉くんは……。まさかのギャップに悶絶必至！ あなたの庇護欲を掻き立てる、よわよわラブコメ開幕!!

altTitles.ja: 理想のヒモ生活

description.en: One day, average salaryman Yamai Zenjirou has an out-of-this-world experience—literally! He's pulled from Earth and dragged to another world where magic thrives and a gorgeous, powerful queen needs a consort. Now he's being pressured to marry that very monarch and help her bear a child. Will Zenjirou accept this life of lazy, luxurious love at the cost of leaving his home behind?
description.ja:
**異世界で巨乳の褐色女王とグータラ生活！？？**

月平均残業時間150時間オーバーの半ブラック企業に勤める山井善治郎は、気がつくと異世界に召喚されていた。善治郎を召喚したのは、善治郎の好みストライクど真ん中な、褐色の爆乳美女。「ようこそ、婿殿」と、いきなり結婚を申し込む異世界の女王様に善治郎の出した結論は……。 サラリーマンが異世界の王族となり、ぐーたらなヒモ生活を謳歌!? 「小説家になろう」で年間ランキング1位を獲得した人気作が待望のコミック化！
description.pt-br:
382 / 5.000
Um dia, o assalariado médio Yamai Zenjirou tem uma experiência de outro mundo - literalmente! Ele é retirado da Terra e arrastado para outro mundo onde a magia prospera e uma rainha linda e poderosa precisa de um consorte. Agora ele está sendo pressionado a se casar com aquela mesma monarca e ajudá-la a ter um filho. Zenjirou aceitará esta vida de amor preguiçoso e luxuoso ao custo de deixar sua casa para trás?

altTitles.ja: 珈琲をしづかに

description.en: Hatano Takaki is a third-year in high school who can’t wait to become a “real adult”. One day, he passes by a café and finds himself mysteriously drawn to the proprietress, a mysterious woman who seems to be hiding a secret sadness. Through her, through coffee, and through his encounters with the other café patrons, he begins to taste the bittersweet feelings of love and growing up.

altTitles.ja: ナニワトモアレ

altTitles.vi: Dù thế nào đi nữa / đó là tình bạn Naniwa

description.en: Guruguru Osaka, crackling ring! Now, the piston in my crotch is tingling!! I like picking up girls more than having three meals. Naniwa's youthful pleasure of being popular and having sex. I'm not a fart with a big loan either. I want to buy a new Silvia. I don't have the skill (technique), but I can't give up on my lewd spirit. An 18-year-old boy is making his ring debut!!

At 19, Kim Gunho is transported to the 23rd century with enhanced abilities. After spending 50 painful years preventing an apocalypse, he returns to his younger self at 19. Now, with the threat gone and no one aware of his suffering, all he desires is to rest and even wishes to die. It will take 100 days to fully eliminate his enhanced cells. As he prepares to spend his final days in peace, he is unexpectedly visited by Ye Haejung, the boy he secretly loved before his time travel.

altTitles.ja: 無自覚エモーション(ラブライブ!)

title.en: Love Live! - Hakanaku Tatazumu Ixia no Hana (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 儚く佇むイキシアの花(ラブライブ!)
メーデー(ラブライブ!)
ニテンサンテンイニシアティブ(ラブライブ!)
メリーさん

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

altTitles.ja: ミスミさんは見透かせない

description.en: A romantic comedy about Yuri Tsuguto, who has clairvoyance but isn’t good at it, and Misumi Mitsuhashi, a girl who likes strange things. One day, when Yuri looks at Misumi’s back, he notices that her jacket is transparent and behind it is the message “If anyone can read this, come to the astronomy clubroom after school.” When he goes to the clubroom and explains his clairvoyance ability, Misumi becomes excited and asks “Why don’t you let me study you?”

altTitles.ja: ウルフちゃんは澄ましたい

altTitles.id: Gadis Serigala Mencoba Untuk Berpura pura Tidak Peduli

altTitles.en: Wolf-chan Is Trying to Feign Indifference

description.en:
The cool, lone-wolf girl and her precious, unrequited crush!

(Source: Ganma!, translated)
description.ja: ウルフカットで一匹狼なクール系女子の尊い片想い！
description.pt-br: A loba solitária fria, e seu precioso amor não correspondido!

altTitles.ja: クールな同級生の◯◯年後...

altTitles.en: The Cool Classmate XX Years Later...

altTitles.vi: Cô bạn cùng lớp lạnh lùng sau ◯◯ năm...

title.en: Magia Record: Mahou Shoujo Madoka★Magica Side Story - Hoshi mo Mienai (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 星もみえない(マギアレコード 魔法少女まどか☆マギカ外伝)

altTitles.en: Even the Stars Are Gone (Magia Record: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story)

altTitles.ja: マネマネ にちにち

description.en: In a certain school lies a certain club and its three managers. Though unremarkable, days that can't be found anywhere else have begun! Drawn by Yamamoto Souichiro is a brand new Sports ground youth story!
description.fr: Dans une certaine lycée se trouve un certain club et ses trois managers. Bien qu'anodins, des jours comme on n'en trouve nulle part ailleurs voient le jour ! Dessiné par Yamamoto Souichiro : une toute nouvelle histoire de jeunesse sur le thème du sport !
description.tl: Sa isang partikular na paaralan ay may isang natatanging klab at ang tatlong tagapamahala nito. Bagama't hindi kapansin-pansin, ay nagsimula na ang mga araw na kahit saan ay hindi matatagpuan! Iginuhit ni Souichiro Yamamoto, ay isang bagong kuwento ng mga kabataan sa larangan ng isports!
description.pt-br: Numa determinada escola reside um determinado clube e as suas três ajudantes. Embora normais, dias que não podem ser encontrados em nenhum outro lugar começaram! Desenhado por Yamamoto Souichirou, é uma nova história juvenil de campo esportivo!

altTitles.en: Tales of a Hundred Ghosts Traveling by the Night

description.en:
Ritsu inherited his sixth sense from his grandfather, along with a demon guardian named Blue Storm. Strange things just seem to happen around these two, and it's left to them to get to the bottom of all these mysterious events. Each story is independent but features recurring characters you'll come to know and appreciate as they, each in their own way, try to deal with things 'not of this world'.  
  
Winner of Award for Excellence in 10th Annual Japan Media Arts Festival.

altTitles.th: เบย์เบลด เบิร์ส

altTitles.ja: ベイブレードバースト

description.en:
Latest reboot of the Beyblade franchise.  
  
AnimeNewsNetwork Links:

altTitles.ja: 怪しいおまわりさん

description.en: A "police box" drama that peeks into the daily life of police officers...

altTitles.ja: 異世界居酒屋｢げん｣

description.en:
There's this pub (Izakaya) called " Gen" that was supposed to be in a certain place in the Kanto region of Japan.  
After opening the door one day, it was found to be connected to the city of Parisia, the Capital of the Eastern Kingdom...   
Individual residents from a foreign world such as crestfallen monks, warriors, noble female chevaliers, daughters of noisy famous aristocrats, etc. all visited the peculiar izakaya which they've never seen before, and gradually they'll become fans of the dishes...  
A foreign world gourmet fantasy has finally started!  
  
***From the same author of Isekai Izakaya "Nobu", which takes place in Kyoto.**
description.ja: 『異世界居酒屋「のぶ」』の作者・蝉川夏哉による原作書き下ろしのスピンオフ作品。次なる世界は異世界・東王国、王都パリシィア!王都パリシィアでも、異世界の住人たちは、初めて見る日本の居酒屋料理に戸惑いながらも舌鼓を打ち……。

altTitles.ja: 鵺の陰陽師

description.en: Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games. A new modern exorcist saga now begins!
description.fr: Yajima est capable de voir les esprits depuis qu'il est tout petit. Dans sa nouvelle école, il y a une pièce que personne d'autre ne peut voir. Et à l'intérieur se trouve un esprit qui aime jouer aux jeux vidéo. Une nouvelle saga d'exorcistes modernes commence !
description.ja: 幼少の頃から「幻妖」と呼ばれる存在が見えた少年・夜島学郎。高校入学初日、ひょんなことから出会ったサブカル好きの幻妖「鵺」に校内の幻妖退治を依頼されるが――…？
description.vi: Yajima đã có thể nhìn thấy các linh hồn từ khi còn nhỏ. Tại ngôi trường mới của cậu ấy có một căn phòng mà không ai khác có thể nhìn thấy. Và bên trong là một linh hồn thích chơi trò chơi điện tử. Một câu chuyện trừ tà hiện đại bắt đầu từ giây phút này!
description.pt-br: Yajima é capaz de enxergar Espíritos desde pequeno. Em sua nova escola há uma sala que mais ninguém consegue ver. E dentro dela mora uma Espírito que ama jogar videogames. Uma nova saga moderna de exorcistas começa agora!

title.en: President, What Are You Doing Here...?

altTitles.ja: 委員長、こんなところで何してるの…

altTitles.ja-ro: Incho, Konna Tokoro de nani Shiteruno…

altTitles.ja: 皆様の玩具です

description.en:
Tsukimiya is a dutiful kid who has been looking after his family since his mother's passing, and a popular pretty boy at school, 
but he rejects all those who confess to him due to an unrequited love he holds for one of his teachers. 
However he suddenly finds himself kidnapped by a group of deranged women, who promise him a life of daily torture from now on.
description.pt-br: Tsukimiya é um garoto obediente que cuida da sua família desde a morte de sua mãe, e um menino bonito e popular na escola, mas ele rejeita todos aqueles que confessam a ele devido a um amor não correspondido que ele possui por um de suas professoras. No entanto, ele de repente se vê sequestrado por um grupo de mulheres bonitas, que lhe prometem uma vida de tortura diária a partir de agora.

title.en: The Story of a Girl Who's My Best Friend, She's Acting Strange Lately

altTitles.ja: 親友の女の子の様子が最近おかしい話

altTitles.ja-ro: Shinyuu no Onnanoko no Yousu ga Saikin Okashii Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of My Best Friend, a Girl Who's Acting Oddly These Days
The Story of a Best Friend, Who is a Girl Acts Odd Nowadays

description.en: My best friend is a girl I have known since elementary school.  She was like a boy, but nowadays she acts odd. We were like two guys, but now... she tries to increase the skinship and gets upset when I speak to girls.

altTitles.en: コイバナ! 恋せよ花火

description.en: Due to some mishaps during her entrance exams, Hanabi Marui finds herself entering a school of mostly boys. This is a problem for our heroine, as she has a huge disgust for the male gender. But then she meets someone who slowly turns her world upside down. This series follows the trials she and her friends go through with love.
description.es: Debido a algunos contratiempos durante sus exámenes de ingreso, Hanabi Marui encuentra a sí misma entrando a una escuela de la mayoría varones. Esto es un problema para nuestra heroína, ya que tiene un enorme disgusto para el género masculino. Pero entonces conoce a alguien que gira lentamente su mundo al revés. Esta serie sigue los ensayos que ella y sus amigos van a través del amor.

altTitles.ja: カニバルトラップ

description.en: The part-time job Izama, a shy high school student who is shy around people, chose was at a flower shop. There, he is in charge of taking care of the Carnivorous Girls, who were born from an experimental mutation!! Their hunger cannot be satisfied by insects alone...!

altTitles.en: TONIKAWA: Over The Moon For You

altTitles.ja: トニカクカワイイ

description.en:
Described as a story full of "love" and "dreams", Tonikaku Kawaii follows a protagonist whose name is written with the characters for "Hoshizora" ("Starry Sky" in Japanese), but whose name is pronounced as "Nasa". On the day of his high school entrance exams, Nasa encounters a beautiful girl. For Nasa, it feels like destiny is finally calling out to him that he will have a girl friend, but…

Note: Volume 15 and 16's numberings are correct, as this is how they are in the original.
description.ru:
Тяжело жить, если родители дали тебе имя НАСА - да, как NASA, и каждый второй спрашивает, пойдешь ли ты в астронавты. Еще тяжелее, если в один день тебя собьет грузовик, ты встретишь любовь всей своей жизни и тут же ее потеряешь, согласившись жениться на ней. Мужик сказал, что женится - значит женись. И заверьте… Веселая комедия положений без особой логики, но с неожиданными поворотами сюжета. Ведь жена и правда с Луны?..   
  
**Tonikaku Cawaii is the official romanization.**
description.pt-br: Aceito sair com você se você se casar comigo.

title.en: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica - Kyou mo, Ashita mo, Asatte mo. (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 今日も、明日も、あさっても。(魔法少女まどか☆マギカ)

altTitles.en: Puella Magi Madoka Magica - Today, Tomorrrow, and the Day After. (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: アンダーニンジャ

description.en: The once-prosperous Japanese ninja are said to have been dismantled by the GHQ following the Pacific War and disappeared. In reality, the ninja still exist in secret, and their number is rumored to be as many as 200,000. Some of the elite ninja work behind the scenes at the national level. On the other hand, the ninja at the end of the line are often unable to find work. One such ninja, Kuro Kumogakure, is living the life of a NEET.

altTitles.ja: ギャルに優しいオタク君

description.en: Otakura is a high school boy who's clearly an otaku, and Narumi is a high school gal. Normally, these two polar opposites would never cross paths, even at school. But by a strange coincidence, it turns out Otakura is able to use his inherently handy nature to help out Narumi with her own hobby-related requests, one after another?
description.id:
Odakura, seorang anak SMA yang terlihat otaku, dan Narumi, seorang gadis SMA yang terlihat seperti seorang gal. Awalnya, mereka adalah dua kutub yang berlawanan yang tidak akur di sekolah, tetapi secara kebetulan, Odakura menggunakan ketangkasan alaminya untuk mengabulkan permintaan Narumi satu demi satu!? 

Komedi romantis remaja sekolahmu♪
description.ja:
見た目がオタクな男子高校生の小田倉と、ギャルな女子高生の鳴海。
本来は学校でも交わらない真逆のタイプの二人だったけれど、ひょんなことから小田倉は持ち前の手先の器用さで、鳴海の趣味に関するお願い事を次々と叶えていって!?

ギャルの趣味を理解するオタク君の学園青春ラブコメディー♪

---

Mitame ga otakuna danshi kōkōsei no Odagura to, gyaruna mesukōsei no Narumi. Honrai wa gakkō demo majiwaranai magyaku no taipu no futaridattakeredo, hyon'nakotokara Odagura wa mochimae no tesaki no kiyō-sa de, Narumi no shumi ni kansuru o negaigoto o tsugitsugi to kanaete itte!? 

Gyaru no shumi o rikai suru otaku-kun no gakuen seishun rabukomedī ♪
description.pt-br: Odakura, um garoto do ensino médio que parece um otaku, e Narumi, uma garota do ensino médio que se parece com uma gal. Originalmente, eles eram polares opostos que não se davam bem na escola, mas por acaso, Odakura usou sua destreza natural para conceder os desejos da Narumi um após o outro!? Sua comédia romântica escolar da juventude.

title.en: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica - Tekitai Sisters! (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 敵対シスターズ! (魔法少女まどか☆マギカ)

altTitles.en: Puella Magi Madoka Magica - Tekitai Sisters! (Doujinshi)

altTitles.en: Puella Magi Madoka Magica - Devil's Worries and the Unchanging Duo (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 叛逆円環会議(魔法少女まどか☆マギカ)

altTitles.en: Puella Magi Madoka Magica - Rebellion Cycles Conference (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: あくまでも悪魔ほむら(魔法少女まどか☆マギカ)

altTitles.en: Puella Magi Madoka Magica - Akuma Homura to the End (Doujinshi)

title.en: Magia Record: Mahou Shoujo Madoka★Magica Side Story - Kazoku ni Narou yo (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: かぞくになろうよ(マギアレコード 魔法少女まどか☆マギカ外伝)

altTitles.en: Let's Become A Family (Magia Record: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story)

altTitles.ja: 恋する鬼畜島

altTitles.vi: Tiểu Đường Ở Đảo Quái Dị

description.en: Love is absolutely forbidden! Kaworu, the "public disciplinary commissioner of justice," uses a chainsaw to purge all the men of their sins in order to protect the purity of the girls! Standing in Kaworu's way is the "boy with high femininity," Takahisa, and Kaworu's sister, Mari, the "demon public disciplinary commissioner." In this parallel world of "Freak Island" set in Santa Maria Academy, a storm of blood and love is about to... erupt!!?

title.en: Mahou Shoujo Madoka★Magica - Nagisa to Koi no Käsetorte (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: なぎさと恋のケーゼ☆トルテ(魔法少女まどか☆マギカ)

altTitles.en: Puella Magi Madoka★Magica - Nagisa and the Cheesecake of Love (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: No Magia Will Cure Love (マギアレコード 魔法少女まどか☆マギカ外伝)

altTitles.en: No Magia Will Cure Love (Magia Record: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story)

title.en: Magia Record: Mahou Shoujo Madoka★Magica Side Story - My Secret Record (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: No Magia Will Cure Love (マギアレコード 魔法少女まどか☆マギカ外伝)

altTitles.en: No Magia Will Cure Love (Magia Record: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story)

altTitles.ja: 転生しちゃったよ（いや、ごめん）

description.en: After a god screws up and accidentally takes high schooler Shou's life, he offers him reincarnation with a gift to make up for it. Shou asks to retain all his old memories for the new life. Shou is reborn as Will, a noble's son in a world where magic use is common and involves knowledge of kanji characters. With all his memories, he's a brilliant toddler, and when he experiments with magic, he finds that he has an amazing talent for it! What's more, though he was smart but unloved in his old life, in his new life he has a mother and a father who both love him deeply. His future as Will is looking very bright!

title.en: Game Master CEO Trapped in a VR World

altTitles.ja: ゲームマスターCEOの異世界永住

description.en: Game Master CEO Trapped in a VR World summary: Everything will be possible in the world of video games in the not-too-distant future, thanks to scientific and technological advancements. One day, a game developer (Game Master) is trapped within the game he created in this world! Despite his high in-game level, knowledge of the main story, and weaknesses of each boss, nothing goes as planned. Random monsters spawn, and random bugs appear in the game. An epic tale that merges the real world with virtual reality, the past and the future, and major roles for allies and enemies, begins.
